availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Elijah Floyd and Mary A. Floyd. Married to Nancy Shaw Floyd. Father of John Floyd, William H. Floyd, Fannie Floyd, Margaret Floyd, and Eliza Floyd. Resident of Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 429A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 350.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Blackwells Precinct, p. 257B.
